description:
Merging everyday comfort with active features, this overachieving sock blends the best of both worlds. Working like a performance sock, its yarn blend wicks moisture and resists odor. Meanwhile, these socks' cushioned heel and toe, low-profile toe seam, and arch support provide exceptional comfort and stability for-profile toe seam, and arch support provide exceptional comfort and stability for all-day wear.

Whether you're running errands, or lazing the day away and running from responsibilities, this all-inclusive sock is with you every step of the way.
name: Saxx Underwear Whole Package Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 60% nylon, 37% cotton, 3% elastane (differs slightly by pattern)
